subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER /
body:
INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER / AUDIT 
UNIT UNITED NATION(WORLD BANK ASSISTED PROGRAMMER) 
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT 
AND TRANSFERS.Ref: WB/NF/UN/XX027 
DEBT SETTLEMENT PANEL 
Attn Franz J. Böhm 
RE: VERIFICATION AND APPROVAL OF YOUR PAYMENT FILE. 
With respect to your compensation fund, we are in acknowledgement of your mail, kindly read below my directives and adhere strictly to the provisions of this recompense committee to ensure hitch-free payment transmission. 
First of all, you are instructed to seize all communications with every financial and non financial institution associated with any payment as further communication with them will be at your own peril. Deal only with me or by my recommendations to remain safe. 
As regards your recompense payment, we are moving your file to the responsible office for endorsement at once and you will be updated as events unfold. Meanwhile, you are to confirm to this body your most preferred payment method and we shall not hesitate to oblige. (1) BANK WIRE TRANSFER PAYMENT. (2) ATM CARD DELIVERY PAYMENT. 
Make your choice of payment and get back to me. 
Finally, considering the bulk of work on our desk with limited exit time, your speedy response will always be anticipated as we will not hesitate to proceed to the next case file should we experience delays from your side. I hope you understand. Awaiting your response. Meanwhile you have to confirm the below details needed from you in your next email to me for clarification. 
Bank Name:......... 
Account Holders Name:..... 
Bank Address:........ 
Bank Account Number:...... 
Routine Number:......... 
Swift Code:............. 
Bank Phone Number:......... 
Will be waiting for your update so we can advise you ahead on how this payment will be completed without delay. 
BEST REGARDS, 
MR.BRIAN THOMAS MOYNIHAN 
DIRECTOR AND CEO BANK OF AMERICA 
 D/LINE:+ 1(917 )336-8462 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2024 at 9:24 PM From: "Floyd" <jz36960@***.com> To: file65619@gmail.com Subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER / 
 
Hello Mr. Bemard Lauwers, 
Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this approved payment! I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news. 
I'm curious though, how did my name end up on the approved list? And could you please explain a bit more about this World Bank Assisted Programmer of Payment and WB NF UN Debt Settlement Panel? It sounds very official and important. 
Also, I'd like to know more about the process of transferring these funds. How does it work exactly? And what is an immediate release of funds? 
Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
Best wishes, 
Floyd

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER /
body:
Hello Mr. Thomas Moynihan,

Thank you for your message and the detailed information about this fund transfer process. I must admit, it's all a bit overwhelming but also quite intriguing.

I'm curious to know more about how my name ended up on this approved list? Could you please explain a bit more about this United Nation World Bank Assisted Program and Debt Settlement Panel? It sounds very official and important.

As for the payment method, I think I would prefer the ATM Card Delivery Payment. However, could you please provide more details about how this works?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Franz J.

Best wishes,
Floyd

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER
body:
INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER / AUDIT 
UNIT UNITED NATION(WORLD BANK ASSISTED PROGRAMMER) 
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT 
AND TRANSFERS.Ref: WB/NF/UN/XX027 
DEBT SETTLEMENT PANEL 
ATTN: BENEFICIARY FLOYD, 
RE: VERIFICATION AND APPROVAL OF YOUR PAYMENT FILE. 
 
 I want to explain the objectives and mission of this office very well to you , but all depends on you  to actualize this means , we know that you have received Several untrue emails from this country and other countries as well before or even now as you have experienced different untrue  emails from  different kind of peoples ,but i want to assure you that this is the reason while this mandate was carried out in other to enable you claim your inheritance or your winning prize and what you could not achieve since all this while if you can vividly remember what we stated in the very first mail we contacted you with. 
 
 Following the series of complaints from Citizens of the United States as well as Citizens of Other Countries In Europe Asia over the Discrepancies and fraudulent ways in which fund transfers are handled by Africans which has made it impossible for a lot of People to claim their Winning or Inheritance funds from most African Countries due to frauds and illegal activities, A decision was reached recently by the United Nation and United States Treasury Department under the authority of the White House to compel African Financial bodies (Banks) to urgently release all funds of American and European, Asian citizens that are trapped in most Banks and Courier Companies in Africa. It was discovered that some bureaucratic bottlenecks were put by these Banks and Couriers to make it impossible for beneficiaries to claim their funds so that they will fraudulently divert those funds to their private accounts and that is your case . 
 
 I write to inform you that following our meeting with the United Nations, CBB and our logistic department on the reimbursement of some funds spent by those victims during the cause of your inadequate dealings with some impostors who claim to be staff in the banks and other regional payment centers. Our reconciliation teams with the prospectus instrument of the United Nations after freezing suspected impostors accounts with some uncompleted transaction, most accounts were dormant and claimed to be funds of late patrons, ex-politician etc. 
 
 This support was fully effective with the help of the World Bank after a summit meeting in London on financial stability issues fluctuating the economy with the international global standard. 
 
 After gathering this information's our logistic department gave us a list of customers to be paid who fall victim to these impostors due to unawareness. and those who have not legally received their inheritance fund . And mode of payment was as well specified for proper conducts and financial regulations to kick against criminality during the process of payment. We have arranged your payment through our paying center, which is the latest instruction from the International Monetary Fund Reconciliation Office and in conjunction with the Bank of America and United Nation Division through the help of the United State Treasury department here in New York  as instructed. 
 
 Consequent upon the aforementioned, this department was personally mandated to handle this matter to ensure that all funds of our Citizens and others which are fraudulently being trapped in African Banks are urgently retrieved and paid to the actual Beneficiaries under a legal manner. Our team of experts were delegated to Benin Republic, Nigeria, Ivory Coast and Ghana for this task and we discovered your File NO: BR227/9005666/00 as unclaimed fund.It was discovered that officials of the Bank has only put up illegal requirements in order to make it difficult for you to claim your fund. 
 
 Finally you are directed to go diligently follow our instructions to enable us finalize your payment as soon as possible, so note that You are hereby selected as an honor for this payment approval which is ready and in good firm here in our paying office, you are to acknowledge the receipt of this Email in returning with the required fee . 
 
 Be informed that you are to reconfirm your information as stated below : 
 
 1. YOUR NAME: 
2. AGE : 
3. PHONE NUMBER AND FAX: 
4. ADDRESS: 
5. AMOUNT TO BE CLAIMED: $5.500,000.00usd 
6. DRIVER LICENSE: 
7. SEX : 
8: COUNTRY : 
 
Kindly reconfirm your full information in order to enable us to program your fund for immediate payment . 
 Once again thank you for fast responding in this transaction. 
 PROMPT ACTION IS NECESSARY AS TIME IS OF ESSENCE, BEST REGARDS, 
MR.BRIAN THOMAS MOYNIHAN 
DIRECTOR AND CEO BANK OF AMERICA 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2024 at 1:56 AM From: "Floyd" <jz36960@***.com> To: bnkofamca@accountant.com Subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL FUNDS TRANSFER / 
 
Hello Mr. Thomas Moynihan, 
Thank you for your message and the detailed information about this fund transfer process. I must admit, it's all a bit overwhelming but also quite intriguing. 
I'm curious to know more about how my name ended up on this approved list? Could you please explain a bit more about this United Nation World Bank Assisted Program and Debt Settlement Panel? It sounds very official and important. 
As for the payment method, I think I would prefer the ATM Card Delivery Payment. However, could you please provide more details about how this works? 
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards, 
Franz J. 
Best wishes, 
Floyd
